the_name_of_the_wind.author: Patrick Rothfuss
the_name_of_the_wind.name: The Name of the Wind
the_name_of_the_wind.resume: The tale of Kvothe, from his childhood in a troupe of traveling players, to years spent as a near-feral orphan in a crime-ridden city, to his daringly brazen yet successful bid to enter a legendary school of magic.

the_way_of_kings.author: Brandon Sanderson
the_way_of_kings.name: The Way of Kings
the_way_of_kings.resume: In a world tormented by brutal warfare, the lives of multiple characters intertwine in the first of an epic fantasy series. Among them, an enslaved man seeks freedom, a soldier discovers his destiny, and a young woman seeks justice.

neuromancer.author: William Gibson
neuromancer.name: Neuromancer
neuromancer.resume: Case was the sharpest data-thief in the matrixâ€”until he crossed the wrong people and they crippled his nervous system, banishing him from cyberspace. Now a new employer has recruited him for a last-chance run at the impossible.

the_martian.author: Andy Weir
the_martian.name: The Martian
the_martian.resume: Stranded on Mars with only a meager amount of supplies, astronaut Mark Watney faces the challenge of a lifetime to survive and find a way to signal to Earth that he is alive.

the_da_vinci_code.author: Dan Brown
the_da_vinci_code.name: The Da Vinci Code
the_da_vinci_code.resume: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is drawn into a complex mystery when a murder in the Louvre Museum leads to a trail of clues hidden in the works of Leonardo da Vinci.

gone_girl.author: Gillian Flynn
gone_girl.name: Gone Girl
gone_girl.resume: On the morning of their fifth wedding anniversary, Nick's wife Amy disappears. Under pressure from the police and a growing media frenzy, Nick's portrait of a blissful union begins to crumble.

the_pillars_of_the_earth.author: Ken Follett
the_pillars_of_the_earth.name: The Pillars of the Earth
the_pillars_of_the_earth.resume: Set in the middle of the 12th century in England, it tells the story of the building of a cathedral in the fictional town of Kingsbridge. It is a tale of ambition, anarchy, and absolute power.

wolf_hall.author: Hilary Mantel
wolf_hall.name: Wolf Hall
wolf_hall.resume: An insightful portrayal of Henry VIII's court through the rise of Thomas Cromwell, from his humble beginnings to becoming the King's chief advisor.

educated.author: Tara Westover
educated.name: Educated
educated.resume: A memoir recounting the struggle of a girl who grows up in a survivalist family in the mountains of Idaho and then goes on to earn a PhD from Cambridge University.

the_power_of_habit.author: Charles Duhigg
the_power_of_habit.name: The Power of Habit
the_power_of_habit.resume: Explores the science behind why habits exist and how they can be changed, providing insight into human nature and its potential for transformation.
